text: aur pratyek samudaay ke lie hamane qurabaanee ka vidhaan kiya, taaki ve un jaanavaron arthaat maveshiyon par allaah ka naam len, jo usane unhen pradaan kie hain. atah tumhaara poojy-prabhu akela poojy-prabhu hai. to usee ke aagyaakaaree banakar raho aur vinamrata apanaanevaalon ko shubh soochana de do
